itunes:title: #180 - Being Boss as a Freelancer or Employee
title: #180 - Being Boss as a Freelancer or Employee
description:
The Being Boss employees are taking over! Emily and Kathleen have mentioned that you can be boss without being THE boss, so the Being Boss employees are sharing how they are boss in freelance, contractor, and employee capacities.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20

Get full show notes for this episode here
